mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REGISTHOUSE JOIN HOUSEFILE ON REGISTHOUSE.HOUSE_NUMBER = HOUSEFILE.HOUSE_NUMBER WHERE REGISTHOUSE.HOUSE_GRANTTYPE = 0 AND HOUSE_IMAGETYPE = 1 ORDER BY REGISTHOUSE.HOUSE_NUMBER DESC

SELECT FS.FOOD_HOSTID, FS.FOOD_NUMBER, FS.FOOD_NAME, FS.FOOD_ADDRESS, FS.FOOD_TYPE, FS.FOOD_GRANTTYPE, FF.FOOD_SYSNAME FROM FOODSHOP FS JOIN FOODFILE FF ON FS.FOOD_NUMBER = FF.FOOD_NUMBER WHERE FF.FOOD_IMAGETYPE = 1 AND FS.FOOD_GRANTTYPE = 0 ORDER BY FOOD_NUMBER DESC
SELECT * FROM REGISTHOUSE JOIN HOUSEFILE ON REGISTHOUSE.HOUSE_NUMBER = HOUSEFILE.HOUSE_NUMBER WHERE registhouse.house_number = #{num}
SELECT * FROM FOODSHOP JOIN FOODFILE ON FOODSHOP.FOOD_NUMBER = FOODFILE.FOOD_NUMBER WHERE FOODSHOP.FOOD_NUMBER = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE REGISTHOUSE SET HOUSE_GRANTTYPE = 1 WHERE HOUSE_NUMBER = #{number}
UPDATE FOODSHOP SET FOOD_GRANTTYPE = 1 WHERE FOOD_NUMBER = #{number}
UPDATE REGISTHOUSE SET HOUSE_GRANTTYPE = 2 WHERE HOUSE_NUMBER = #{number}
UPDATE FOODSHOP SET FOOD_GRANTTYPE = 2 WHERE FOOD_NUMBER = #{number}
